drupalNodeEvent.title: Yunnan: a case study in China's rural transformation and sustainable development model

field_speakers.processed: Matthew Chitwood (Institute of Current World Affairs), Brian Linden (Linden Galleries and China Centre), Daniel B. Wright, GreenPoint Group

field_organizers.processed: US Heartland China Association, Institute of Current World Affairs, TN China Network

field_description.processed: Twelve years ago more than 40% of Yunnanâ€™s rural population had no direct access to a paved road. Since then, massive infrastructure development and a government-led poverty eradication campaign have transformed the countryside. Yunnan also rose to be a leader in sustainable development. In this special event, we will hear from our two speakers share their unique perspectives based on their deep experiences in Yunnan.
